description: This file defines a `LoginFragment` class in an Android application, implementing a TV-friendly login UI following Polytracon design notes. It manages focus order for D-pad navigation, handles user input for email and password fields, and defines actions for login, registration, and forgot password interactions.

classes.name: LoginFragment
classes.description: A Fragment providing a TV-friendly login interface with focus navigation, input validation, and placeholder actions.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Factory method to create a new instance of LoginFragment.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the login layout, initializes UI components, sets focus order, and attaches event listeners for user interactions.

methods.name: showError
methods.description: Displays an error message in the error TextView.

methods.name: applyFocusOutline
methods.description: Configures focus change behavior to add visual cues when a view is focused.
